product.title: Aito Flat Iron Comb Attachment,Hair Straightener Comb Attachment,Grip Comb for Flat Iron,Heat Resistant Comb,Universal Size,Straightening 2x Faster (Black+Purple)
product.title_excluding_brand: Flat Iron Comb Attachment,Hair Straightener Comb Attachment,Grip Comb for Flat Iron,Heat Resistant Comb,Universal Size,Straightening 2x Faster (Black+Purple)
product.description: Achieve sleek and flawless hair effortlessly with our Flat Iron Comb Attachment in sleek black! Upgrade your hair straightening routine with this hair straightener comb attachment that grips perfectly to your flat iron, ensuring precise and even straightening. The heat-resistant comb material allows you to style with confidence, without worrying about damage. Experience the convenience of straightening your hair 2x faster with this universal size comb that fits most flat irons. Get our Flat Iron Comb Attachment in a set of 2pcs and enjoy the ease and speed of achieving salon-worthy results at home. Don't miss the chance to elevate your hair styling game - get yours now and experience the ultimate smoothness and efficiency!

product.description_full:
Achieve sleek and flawless hair effortlessly with our Flat Iron Comb Attachment in sleek black! Upgrade your hair straightening routine with this hair straightener comb attachment that grips perfectly to your flat iron, ensuring precise and even straightening. The heat-resistant comb material allows you to style with confidence, without worrying about damage. Experience the convenience of straightening your hair 2x faster with this universal size comb that fits most flat irons. Get our Flat Iron Comb Attachment in a set of 2pcs and enjoy the ease and speed of achieving salon-worthy results at home. Don't miss the chance to elevate your hair styling game - get yours now and experience the ultimate smoothness and efficiency! * HEAT RESISTANT UP TO 465° - Experience worry-free styling with our heat-resistant hair straightener comb. Its advanced carbon fiber material design ensures it can withstand high temperatures up to 465°, keeping the comb and adhesive intact for long-lasting use.
 * ONE SIZE FITS ALL - Designed to accommodate all sizes of hair straighteners, our grip comb is versatile and suitable for everyone. No matter the size of your hair straightener, you can effortlessly glide the comb through your hair, achieving a smooth and polished look.
 * x2 STRAIGHTENING SPEED - Save valuable time in your daily hair routine with our barber combs professional. Its innovative design allows for efficient straightening, reducing the time it takes to achieve sleek and straight hair.
 * EVEN HEAT DISTRIBUTION & HEAT REDUCTION - Experience salon-quality results at home with our silk press straightener comb. The unique bristle pattern and materials evenly distribute heat across your hair, ensuring consistent styling and reducing frizz.
 * SAY GOODBYE TO STEAM AND BURN FINGERS - You no longer need to juggle a comb or brush while using your hair straightener. This hot comb hair straightener integrated design allows for a seamless straightening experience, providing effortless control and precision.
product.description_full_html:
Achieve sleek and flawless hair effortlessly with our Flat Iron Comb Attachment in sleek black! Upgrade your hair straightening routine with this hair straightener comb attachment that grips perfectly to your flat iron, ensuring precise and even straightening. The heat-resistant comb material allows you to style with confidence, without worrying about damage. Experience the convenience of straightening your hair 2x faster with this universal size comb that fits most flat irons. Get our Flat Iron Comb Attachment in a set of 2pcs and enjoy the ease and speed of achieving salon-worthy results at home. Don't miss the chance to elevate your hair styling game - get yours now and experience the ultimate smoothness and efficiency!
  • HEAT RESISTANT UP TO 465° - Experience worry-free styling with our heat-resistant hair straightener comb. Its advanced carbon fiber material design ensures it can withstand high temperatures up to 465°, keeping the comb and adhesive intact for long-lasting use.
  • ONE SIZE FITS ALL - Designed to accommodate all sizes of hair straighteners, our grip comb is versatile and suitable for everyone. No matter the size of your hair straightener, you can effortlessly glide the comb through your hair, achieving a smooth and polished look.
  • x2 STRAIGHTENING SPEED - Save valuable time in your daily hair routine with our barber combs professional. Its innovative design allows for efficient straightening, reducing the time it takes to achieve sleek and straight hair.
  • EVEN HEAT DISTRIBUTION & HEAT REDUCTION - Experience salon-quality results at home with our silk press straightener comb. The unique bristle pattern and materials evenly distribute heat across your hair, ensuring consistent styling and reducing frizz.
  • SAY GOODBYE TO STEAM AND BURN FINGERS - You no longer need to juggle a comb or brush while using your hair straightener. This hot comb hair straightener integrated design allows for a seamless straightening experience, providing effortless control and precision.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
